divs: sighting details i was out walking my dogs the night of the 21st of oct around 9:00 & as always, i'm looking up & i see a giant triangle moving fairly slowly from north to south in the florida sky. silent, it caught my eye because there were 2 rows of steady non pulsating or flashing lights framing the outline of the craft meeting at point, very dim overall. it was about 500ft up under the clouds, larger than a football field; it stayed in my view for about 20 secs until i couldn't see the lights anymore. just last month in the same area i saw something very high up in the atmosphere manuvering around like it "shouldn't have" but this was my first unmistakable. it was huge & defiantly a triangle, on the side w\o lights i could sense a solidness. the thing was darker than the surrounding sky & then quietly was gone. this time i don't know what else you could say it was
trends: There have been 37 other sightings in Fort Lauderdale
There were no other sightings in Fort Lauderdale on or around October 21st 2011
Summary: out walking dogs at night, i look up & see a giant triangle dimly lit up from bottom by 2 lines connecting at a point
